nodes.text: A helmet or helm was a type of protective headgear. The Helm of Ieldis was an example of a helmet, as were the clone trooper learning helmets. The swoop racer Blizz Pinnix's true appearance or gender was unknown by the general public due to the racer never appearing without wearing a helmet. While primarily used to protect the head, ancient Mandalorian soldiers cooked uj'alayi in their helmets.
